W

WebAccessibleBean - Interface in net.danielkvasnicka.flower.beans

WebAccessibleBeanResolver - Interface in net.danielkvasnicka.flower.core.api
A bean resolver that decides which bean should be loaded, based on the current URL and all available URL mappings.
